job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
As a Software Engineer you'll be working closely with the product management, design and engineering staff, you are a key technical contributor to the design and assembly of new technology, components, capabilities, and products that grow Finder’s capabilities.
A natural problem-solver, you will work alongside fellow Engineers, your Engineering Lead, Principal, and Product Manager creating solutions. You will act as a force multiplier, exemplifying high productivity, setting the standard as an inspiration for your team. You will champion and embody great software engineering principles to deliver a better experience for our users, and an engaging technology-led engineering environment. You are hungry, and always working on mastery of your craft.
This is not a checklist of requirements, don’t worry if you don’t satisfy all, we’d still love to talk.
If this sounds like the kind of opportunity you've been looking for, select the 'Apply Now' button below to submit your cover letter and resume. Use your cover letter to introduce us to you; we want to know who you are, what you've worked on and why you think you'd be a great addition to the Finder team.
